pageContext.claim: “The badly flawed Paris Climate Agreement protects the polluters, hurts Americans, and cost a fortune. NOT ON MY WATCH!”
pageContext.analysis: The Post climate team {reported}, “It’s not too clear what polluters he has in mind. The president has attempted to protect Appalachian coal mining companies by rolling back a variety of regulations for protecting streams and wetlands. He has also responded to small to medium independent oil and gas companies by seeking to lift limits on emissions of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. “
